effect.potion-of-dissociation.dissociati: Temporarily removes you from your body
text.config.potion-of-dissociation.title: Potion Of Dissociation Config
text.config.potion-of-dissociation.optio: Enables the default recipe for the potion.
Disable this if you want to use your own.
Sounds will be heard from the body, not the camera
